channel.title: Code To Large? Compile Error

item.title: Code To Large? Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

As posted in your other topic.

----I got a big problem----- Giving ADMIN to whoever Helps Me!

No, your packet is full, you have too many things taking up your second click NPC packet, try removing some useless shops that aren’t being used, or combine two shops, like don’t have a woodcutting shop, and a skilling shop, have the woodcutting shop put into the skilling shop etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Code To Large? Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Plz help asap, eright now plz! Im adding a new shop and i put the things i need, an npc, a shop, and somin’ in client.java(BTW: i did it be4 and it worked)

untitled.jpg1024×768

I keep getting that error when i compile + the shop wont work when i talk to the guy! is my server Retarded or somin?!?!?!? Here are my codes:

NPC (That wartface goblin):

spawn = 297 2738 3471 0 0 0 0 0 0 God

Shop (BTW: the shop I.D. 71 hasn’t been taken yet):

shop = 71 god Armour Shop 1 1 2653 300 2655 300 2657 300 2659 300 2661 300 2663 300 2665 300 2667 300 2669 300 2671 300 2673 300 2675 300

And the thing and client.java:

} else if (NPCID == 297) { //God PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71;// god Armour Shop

Some b4 and after the client.java thing:

} else if (NPCID == 252) { // Travel PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 70;// Travel shop } else if (NPCID == 297) { //God PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71;// god Armour Shop } else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santas holiday stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; } else if (NPCID == 2262) { // dark mage rbe shp PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 32;

While your here: Can some1 plz tell me how TO MAKE fire capes and dragon axes not atack on each other?
